title._content: [Portrait of Lee Sherman, Radio City Music Hall, New York, N.Y., ca. June 1947] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Lee Sherman, Radio City Music Hall, New York, N.Y., ca. June 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 291 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Sherman, Lee Dancers--1940-1950. Jazz dance--1940-1950. Radio City Music Hall Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Group portraits--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
